short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Any flash content for web can be run using a Flash Player. E.g. flash games.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 一款网页flash播放器插件，可使任何flash内容正常运行，例如flash游戏。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Original flash player is nowadays disabled in the browser. Don't worry, just install this simple flash player. The flash player automatically recognises any flash content on a webpage and replaces it with "play" button. In a word, you can install this extension to unlock old flash games or other flash content. 
Automatically detects the flash content of a website and generates a "play" button.
Play flash games, watch flash videos and more.
Easy to use, one click to play flash content.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
浏览器一直提示“不支持此插件”和“Adobe Flash Player 被阻止”的提示？不用担心，安装这个简单的flash播放器即可。flash播放器能够自动识别网页上的任何flash内容，将并将这些内容替换“播放”。您通过单击即可播放在任何网站上Flash内容。

特点：
1. 自动检测网站的flash内容，并生成“播放”按钮。
2. 无需下载Flash插件，即可玩Flash游戏、看Flash视频等。
3. 操作简单，一键点击即可播放flash内容
